programme.title: Ralfs gatavo
programme.desc: Bērnu fantāzijai nav robežu! Un virtuvē, kurā saimnieko brālīši Ralfs un Martins, gatavošana ātri vien kļūst par izklaidi. Bagete šeit vienā mirklī pārvēršas zobenā, pūdercukurs kļūst par sniegu, no sviesta tiek būvētas piramīdas, bet no mīklas top vesels zoodārzs. Un, lai katrā sērijā uzzinātu arī kaut ko jaunu un vērtīgu par dažādiem pārtikas produktiem, puikas brauc ciemos – meklēt lielāko ķirbi, kārtīgi pasvīst zemeņu vagās, skaitīt graudiņus kukurūzas vālītēs un apciemot kaziņas. Meties šajā piedzīvojumā kopā ar mazajiem pavāriem un skaties jaunās "Ralfs gatavo" sērijas sestdienās 9:30 no rīta LTV1 un LSM bērnistabā!

programme.title: V.I.P. - Veiksme. Intuīcija. Prāts
programme.desc: Veiksme, intuīcija, prāts - izaicinājums, kurā zināšanas, nojauta un pieredze palīdzēs atklāt, cik labi pazīstam dabu un tās radības. Šovakar kapteiņi: Inese Kreicberga un Ģirts Bērziņš. Inese Kreicberga - komandas kapteine. Raidījuma "Ķepa uz sirds" idejas autore un veidotāja. Ieguvusi bakalaura grādu komunikācijas zinātnē un maģistra grādu politikas zinātnē. No bērnības vienmēr gribējusi suni un tagad jau to varētu atļauties, bet jo vairāk zina par suņiem, jo vairāk saprot lielo atbildību un sava suņa Inesei vēl pagaidām nav. Tāpēc viņas sirds jau daudzus gadus pieder kaķiem, ir kaķenīte Peppera. Magnuss Eriņš - raidījuma "Ķepa uz sirds" aizkadra balss jau 14 gadus, kolēģis, TV raidījumu vadītājs/radio ētera personība, arī DJ. Pašam ir kaķis Žanis, kuru izglāba no ielas. Magnuss bieži radio raidījumos saka: "Jums nevajag suni, nu, tiešām nevajag." Redzot, cik daudz cilvēku joprojām ir bezatbildīgi, jākonstatē, ka daudzi cilvēki NAV pelnījuši dzīvniekus... un tāpēc viņiem tos tiešām nevajag. Raivo Kreicbergs - Ineses brālis un mārketinga partneris, kopā ar raidījumu "Ķepa uz sirds" jau no pirmās dienas. Ikdienas darbs saistīts ar zīmolu radīšanu un radošo mārketingu, kā arī ar zīmolu pieslīpēšanu eksporta tirgiem. Hobiji - viss, kas saistīts ar prāta atslēgšanu, klusumu un pabūšanu ar sevi, piemēram, izbraucieni ar motociklu, ceļošana, jaunu sajūtu atklāšana. "Es tik ļoti mīlu dzīvniekus, ka man to nav." Putnu eksperts, pēdējos gados sācis daudz laika veltīt putnu vērošanai, barošanai, fotografēšanai. Tieši Latvijas putni viņam daudz fotografēti un izpētīti. Ar komandu satiekas pirmo reizi, kopā saveda raidījuma "Ķepa uz sirds" veidotāji. Ļoti iedziļinās katra pacienta situācijā, pašai ir divi burmas kaķi. Zane Zagorska - eksotisko dzīvnieku eksperte, ar vairāku gadu pieredzi to audzēšanā un labturībā, īpašu interesi gan izrādot par rāpuļiem un posmkājiem. Pašai mājās ir visi eksotiskie zvēri un putni, ko tik var iedomāties.

programme.title: Komisārs Reksis
programme.desc: Pēc piecu gadu cietumsoda tiek atbrīvots bankas aplaupītājs Pēteris Rogners, tomēr viņam ne tuvu nav padomā stāšanās uz pareizā ceļa. Viņa mīļotā sieviete un līdzdalībniece Brigita jau ir sagatavojusi visu nepieciešamo jauniem noziegumiem, starp kuriem ietilpst arī atriebība Aleksandram Brantneram par aizturēšanu bankas aplaupīšanas laikā.

programme.title: Komisārs Reksis
programme.desc: Vuārists Albīns Mālers nejauši dokumentē kādas sievietes slepkavību. Tomēr tā vietā, lai par redzēto informētu policiju, viņš nolemj pierādījumus izmantot savā labā – slepkavas šantāžai. Aukstasinīgais slepkava gan nav ar pliku roku ņemams, un Mālera neapdomības dēļ būs jāmirst kādam nevainīgajam.

programme.title: Komisārs Reksis
programme.desc: Tenisa hallē ir noticis kāds nepatīkams starpgadījums, par ko vainīgie ir vienojušies klusēt. Tomēr izskatās, ka ir kāds, kas grib viņus apklusināt pavisam – neilgi viens pēc otra mirst divi no iesaistītajiem cilvēkiem. Lai izmeklētāji atrastu vainīgo abās slepkavībās, viņiem ir jāuzzina, kas bija šis sākotnējais notikums, kam paliek arvien mazāk liecinieku.

programme.title: Komisārs Reksis
programme.desc: Brantners, maskējies par cietumnieku Vāgneru, cenšas no spridzinātāja Friča Caha uzzināt, kur viņš ir noslēpis nolaupīto naudu un bīstamas sprāgstvielas. Lai iegūtu Caha uzticību, Brantners palīdz viņam izbēgt, un viņi kopā dodas pie Beka, kurš arī iejuties kriminālās autoritātes tēlā. Lai gan Reksim tas nenākas viegli, arī viņam ir jātēlo līdzi. Daudz labprātāk Reksis apgūst jaunas iemaņas, kas noder brīdī, kad izmeklētāji virs kāda bērnudārza atrod Caha uzstādīto bumbu ar laika degli.

programme.title: Komisārs Reksis
programme.desc: Vīnes tuvumā uzdarbojas kāds noziedzīgs grupējums, kas pārtver kravas mašīnas, ar kurām no Šveices uz Ungāriju tiek transportēti medikamenti, un nogalina šoferus. Kāds bandas loceklis pats tiek sašauts, bet pirms nāves par noziegumiem paspēj izstāstīt mācītājam Aueram. Lai gan mācītājs zina patiesību, viņš nedrīkst izpaust grēksūdzes saturu policijai, tāpēc, cenšoties risināt situāciju saviem spēkiem, drīz nonāk briesmās. Nu Brantneram ar komandu nākas ne tikai atrast un apturēt noziedzniekus, bet arī glābt mācītāju. Rekša lieliskās prasmes palīdz ne tikai novērst nākamo tālbraucēja šofera nāvi un atbrīvot mācītāju, bet bīstamā situācijā glābj arī Brantneru.

programme.title: Biatlons. Pasaules kauss sievietēm Estešundā
programme.desc: Jaunā Pasaules kausa biatlona sezona šoreiz sāksies Zviedrijas pilsētā Estešundā, turklāt pats pirmais būs pagarinātais posms, kas turpināsies arī visu nākamo nedēļu, sacensību programmā būs 10 atsevišķas disciplīnas. Šīs nedēļas nogalē būs tikai stafetes – gan klasiskās, gan arī jauktās. Sezona kopumā varētu būt ļoti interesanta, kopā atkal būs deviņi posmi, bet vēl būs arī Milānas-Kortīnas ziemas olimpiskās spēles februārī, kas biatlonā notiks Antholcas trasē. Stafetēs varēs piedalīties arī Latvija, kaut gan pērnajā sezonā Nāciju kausa vērtējumā mūsējie bija diezgan zemu, un tas nozīmē, ka visās individuālajās disciplīnās vārēsim pieteikt tikai trīs dalībniekus. Sievietēm klasiskajā stafetē neapšaubāmas favorītes ir Francijas sportistes, kas šajā disciplīnā uzvarēja arī pērnajā sezonā. Francijas sastāvā gan pirmajā posmā nebūs Žilī Simonas, ko biatlona vadība diskvalificējusi uz sešiem mēnešiem par krāpšanos ar komandas biedres kredītkarti. Ar Franciju centīsies konkurēt Zviedrijas, Norvēģijas un Vācijas biatlonistes, šosezon noteikti arī Itālija (ierindā atkal ir 2023./24. gada sezonas Pasaules kausa ieguvēja Liza Vitoci). Latvija tieši stafetē sievietēm pērnajā sezonā bija 15. vietā, kas nav slikti. Komandas līdere ir Baiba Bendika, nu jau ar Pasaules kausa pieredzi ir arī Estere Volfa un Elza Bleidele, komandā ir arī dvīņu māsas Buliņas, par vietu sastāvā cīnās Annija Keita Sabule. Redzēsim, kāda būs treneru izvēle sastāvam pirmajā posmā, vairāk par četrām Estešundā nebūs, pārējām būs jāstartē IBU kausa izcīņā, jo individuālajās disciplīnās tāpat varēs pieteikt tikai trīs sportistes.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Šķiet, ka nu 31. iecirknī viss apgrozās tikai ap Janiku Dibo. Viņš zvanās bijušajiem kolēģiem, taču viņu ir grūti izsekot. Izabella un Noelija turpina izmeklēt mirušās ķīnietes lietu. Brijērs piedāvā Janikam tikties un sniegt interviju. Dasja piedzīvo uzbrukumu.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Seriāls "Policijas iecirknis 31" seko stāstam par detektīvseržanti Nadīnu Legrānu un viņas kolēģi Patriku Bisonē, kā arī citiem viņu biedriem policijas iecirknī, kur viņi sastopas ar ikdienas noziegumiem, kas notiek lielajās pilsētās: slepkavības, nolaupīšanas, ielaušanās, vardarbība ģimenē, narkotiku tirdzniecība, terorisms un daudz kas cits.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Seriāls "Policijas iecirknis 31" seko stāstam par detektīvseržanti Nadīnu Legrānu un viņas kolēģi Patriku Bisonē, kā arī citiem viņu biedriem policijas iecirknī, kur viņi sastopas ar ikdienas noziegumiem, kas notiek lielajās pilsētās: slepkavības, nolaupīšanas, ielaušanās, vardarbība ģimenē, narkotiku tirdzniecība, terorisms un daudz kas cits.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Seriāls "Policijas iecirknis 31" seko stāstam par detektīvseržanti Nadīnu Legrānu un viņas kolēģi Patriku Bisonē, kā arī citiem viņu biedriem policijas iecirknī, kur viņi sastopas ar ikdienas noziegumiem, kas notiek lielajās pilsētās: slepkavības, nolaupīšanas, ielaušanās, vardarbība ģimenē, narkotiku tirdzniecība, terorisms un daudz kas cits.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Janiks zvana Gabrielai - viņš ir bīstami tuvu un zaudējis jebkādu piesardzību. Bruno un Patriks veic narkotiku pārvadātāja arestu, taču lietas apstākļi ir vairāk nekā aizdomīgi un šķiet, ka tur iesaistīts kāds no komandas, kas, izrādās, ir slepenpolicijas dubultaģents.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Komandai - jauna lieta, kas skar diskrētas ķermeņa daļas... Lai veiktu izmeklēšanu, Noelijai jāiejūtas pavisam neierastā lomā. Cietumnieku furgonā pa ceļam uz tiesu Donalds Velšs mirst no sirdslēkmes, vai vismaz sākotnēji tā tiek uzskatīts.

programme.title: Biatlons. Pasaules kauss vīriešiem Estešundā
programme.desc: Stafetē vīriešiem, tāpat kā sievietēm, galvenā favorīte ir Francija. Francija pērn pārliecinoši uzvarēja šajā disciplīnā, turklāt sīvāko sāncenšu norvēģu komandā šajā sezonā vairs nebūs brāļu Juhannesa Tīngnēsa un Tarjeija Bē. Brāļu atvadīšanās no biatlona pirms olimpiskās sezonas daudziem bija liels pārsteigums, bet tāda ir viņu izvēle. Tas noteikti mainīs spēka samēru biatlonā vīriešiem, jo Juhanness Tīngnēss Bē bija tiešām leģendārs biatlonists, viens no visu laiku lielākajiem izcilniekiem. Tieši stafetē bija ierasts vienmēr redzēt startējam brāļus Bē, un bez viņiem šis kvartets jau būs pavisam citādāks. Jā, norvēģiem ir daudzi jauni un talantīgi sportisti, būs arī pieredzējušais Stūrla Holms Legreids (pērnās sezonas Pasaules kausa ieguvējs), taču stafetē kardinālas izmaiņas bieži vien neko labu nesola, vismaz pirmajos posmos. Ar Franciju un Norvēģiju noteikti centīsies konkurēt Zviedrija un Vācija, tāpat arī ASV, Itālija un Ukraina. Latvija pērn bija gaužām zemu vīriešu stafetes vērtējumā – tikai 21. vietā no 22 izlasēm. Jādomā, atmosfēra izlasē tomēr šosezon būs veselīgāka, nekā iepriekš, un varēs startēt visi labākie, – parasti stafetē devās Renārs Birkentāls, Aleksandrs Patrijuks, Edgars Mise un Andrejs Rastorgujevs, taču ļoti talantīgs (un ātrs slēpošanā) ir pavisam jaunais Rihards Lozbers

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Seriāls "Policijas iecirknis 31" seko stāstam par detektīvseržanti Nadīnu Legrānu un viņas kolēģi Patriku Bisonē, kā arī citiem viņu biedriem policijas iecirknī, kur viņi sastopas ar ikdienas noziegumiem, kas notiek lielajās pilsētās: slepkavības, nolaupīšanas, ielaušanās, vardarbība ģimenē, narkotiku tirdzniecība, terorisms un daudz kas cits.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Komanda ierodas darbā svētdienā, lai dzītu pēdas Janikam un, balstoties uz policista noziedznieka psiholoģisko profilu, īsteno plānu, kas izprovocētu Janiku. Komanda pavirzās soli tuvāk vairākām lietām, atklājot Freda Morāna identitāti.

programme.title: Slepkavības ģimenēs
programme.desc: Pēc traģiskas sadursmes Fīniksas priekšpilsētā vainīgais aizbēg no notikuma vietas, bet divas sievietes smagā stāvoklī tiek nogādātas slimnīcā. Noskaidrojas, ka cietušās ir irākiešu izcelsmes sievietes - jaunā Nora un viņas ģimenes draudzene Amala. Meklējot vainīgo, policijas uzmanību piesaista Noras sarežģītās attiecības ar tēvu, kas, šķiet, pārvērtušās naidā.

programme.title: Midsomeras slepkavības
programme.desc: Kad vietējās baznīcas kurators tiek sadedzināts dzīvs, Bārnabijs un Skots sāk izmeklēt slepkavību. Daudzi ciemata iedzīvotāji vaino Alanu Klifordu, kurš savu bagātību ir ieguvis seksa industrijā un pārcēlies uz vietējo muižu. Tomēr ciematā bija citi, kas iebilda pret to, ko viņi uzskatīja par pagānu svētkiem. Kad tiek nogalināts arī vikārs, policijai ir grūtības atturēt dažus ciema iedzīvotājus no atbildības pārņemšanas savās rokās. Bojāgājušo skaitam pieaugot, Bārnabijs saprot, ka risinājums meklējams vecajos pagasta ierakstos.

programme.title: Melnais saraksts
programme.desc: Kritiķu un skatītāju iemīļots kriminālseriāls. Tā darbība sākas dienā, kad darbu FIB galvenajā birojā Vašingtonā uzsāk jauna profilētāja Elizabete Kīna. Tajā pašā rītā tur ierodas viens no FIB meklētākajiem noziedzniekiem, Reimonds "Reds" Redingtons, un labprātīgi ļauj sevi notvert. Reds palīdz FIB sagūstīt citu bīstamu noziedznieku un novērst uzbrukumu civiliedzīvotājiem. Viņš paziņo, ka viņam esot vesels saraksts un informācija par tādiem noziedzniekiem un teroristiem, par kuru esamību FIB pat nenojauš. Reds ir gatavs sadarboties ar vienu savādu noteikumu – viņš runās tikai ar Elizabeti. Tā sākas īpašas attiecības, kuru īstā daba un iemesls ir zināmi tikai Redingtonam. Lai gan pamatā seriāla darbība norit ASV, tas aizved arī uz dažādām eksotiskām vietām visā pasaulē un ļauj ieskatīties kriminālajā pasaulē. Dažādiem apbalvojumiem vairāku gadu laikā izvirzīti seriāla specefektu veidotāji, kaskadieri un muzikālais noformējums.

programme.title: Viņpus paradīzei
programme.desc: Seriāls ir BBC veidota krimināldrāma, kas atvasināta no seriāla "Nāve paradīzē" sižeta līnijas. Stāsts vēsta par detektīvu inspektoru Hamfriju Gudmenu, kurš pametis Karību salu Sentmerī, lai būtu kopā ar Martu Loidu. Kad abi saderinājušies, viņi pārceļas uz Martas dzimto pilsētu Šiptonebotu, kas atrodas Devonā. Hamfrijs sāk darbu vietējā policijas iecirknī. Viņš spēj atstāt spilgtu iespaidu uz vietējiem policistiem: seržanti Esteri Viljamsu, konsteblu Kelbiju Hārtfordu un biroja vadītāju Margo Mārtinsu. Visi ir pārsteigti par jaunā detektīva darba metodēm, kuras izrādās visai iedarbīgas.

programme.title: Nelūgtie viesi
programme.desc: Amanda nejauši satiek Žannu. Rasma ierodas pie Amandas, un abām rodas ideja, kā palīdzēt Ričardam un Oskaram.

programme.title: Zinātnes noslēpumi
programme.desc: Dažādas mūsu ikdienā ierastas darbības un notikumi, izskaidroti no zinātnes viedokļa.

programme.title: Vides fakti
programme.desc: Raidījums par norisēm dabā un apkārtējā vidē. "Vides fakti" sniedz informāciju par sezonālām norisēm dabā un dzīvnieku pasaulē, par vides aktualitātēm, par videi draudzīgu dzīvesveidu, par aktuālām cilvēka un vides attiecībām ārpus Latvijas robežām. Raidījumā "Vides fakti" ir skatāmi arī piedzīvojumu sižeti par aktīvā tūrisma iespējām Latvijā, kā arī īsfilmas par neparastiem ceļojumiem pasaulē.

programme.title: Kultūrdeva
programme.desc: Raidījumā "Kultūrdeva" viesos būs "Spēlmaņu nakts" balvas nākamās sezonas žūrijas priekšsēdētājs, teātra kritiķis Atis Rozentāls, kā arī divas galeristes - mākslas galeriju asociācijas vadītāja Elīna Drāke, kura pati darbojas galerijā "Asni", un galerijas "Alma" vadītāja Astrīda Riņķe.

programme.title: Lielās patiesības
programme.desc: "Lielās patiesības" ir raidījuma "Saknes debesīs" jaunās versijas nosaukums. Lielo patiesību jautājumi: Dzīvība, Nāve, Dievs, Cilvēks, Mīlestība, Bezgalība… Tie ir jautājumi, kas nebeidzami rada jaunus jautājumus. "Lielās patiesības" ir zinātnes, reliģijas un mākslas dialogs.

programme.title: Daudz laimes, jubilār!
programme.desc: Novembris ir ne tikai Lāčplēša dienas un mūsu valsts dzimšanas dienas mēnesis, bet arī Radio jubilejas mēnesis, tāpēc, svētku mēnesi noslēdzot, raidījums "Daudz laimes, jubilār!" uz sarunu aicinājis Aivu Rozenbergu, kurai ir saistība ar visiem iepriekšminētajiem novembra notikumiem. Un, proti, esot Vairas Vīķes-Freibergas preses sekretāres amatā abus prezidentūras termiņus, Aivai valsts svētki allaž bijuši aizņemtākais darba laiks, kad dienas saplānotas pa minūtēm. Savukārt savu darba karjeru Rozenberga sākusi radio - bijusi ārzemju ziņu redaktore Latvijas Radio Ziņu dienestā, četrus mēnešus pavadot arī mūsu radio Igaunijas korespondentes statusā. Aiva saka, ka viņa nav liela dzimšanas dienu svinētāja, vēl jo vairāk tāpēc, ka, gan esot prezidentes preses dienestā, gan arī veidojot mūsu valsts publisko tēlu sadarbībā ar citām valsts amatpersonām, Rozenberga gluži vienkārši savu šūpuļsvētku laikā nav bijusi mājās! Arī tagad, vadot tik apjomīgus projektus kā "Latviešu grāmatai 500" (sadarbībā ar Nacionālo bibliotēku) un Lielo talku (kopā ar Vitu Jaunzemi), Aivai brīvdienas bieži mēdz būt aizņemtākās darba dienas.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: Border Protection Spain
programme.desc: Along the Spanish shores, the festival honoring the patron saint of sailors comes alive with vibrant events. The Coastguards face the challenge of ensuring safety amid the celebrations. In the Balearic Islands, maritime authorities crack down on vessels hosting clandestine parties. Down south, a thrilling pursuit unfolds as two minors are suspected of illegal fishing. A blend of tradition, enforcement, and high-stakes action on the high seas!

programme.title: Border Protection Spain
programme.desc: In the South, coastguards discover a new strategy by traffickers, leaving bundles submerged for extended periods. In Madrid, at the Customs Surveillance Service, they track the signal of a narco-submarine believed to have departed from Colombia with cocaine. Furthermore, jet skis have been detected creating dangerous situations along the Costa Dorada.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana heads for a lawless region in Southeast Asia to investigate a diabolical scamming operation. Criminal groups are luring workers from across the world with the promise of good jobs, only to hold them prisoner and force them to scam. Its part of a multibillion-dollar industry known as the "pig butchering" scam — and countless Americans have fallen victim.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana investigates a deadly new fentanyl cocktail called "tranq dope" thats devastating American users. Shes spent her career covering the deadly waves of the countrys opioid crisis, but shes never seen it this bad. Seeking answers, she heads to Sinaloa, the heart of Mexicos cartel land, to get answers, and makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Airport Security: Brazil
programme.desc: Federal Police at Sao Paulo International Airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. Their main threat, cocaine smuggling. Agents arrest two different carriers on a flight to Ethiopia. One has cocaine in shampoo bottles; the other, in fabric dye containers. Intel flags a man heading to Hong Kong. He has capsules taped to his body - and possibly other places as well. A woman has two empty backpacks in her suitcase, and both hide cocaine.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: In "Ice Road Rescue" we follow a group of heroic and tough men who challenges the rought winter conditions in Norway by rescuing heavy trailers passing through the norwegian mountain terrain. We follow our main charachters, the heroic rescue workers, in both the southern and norhern mountains of norway. With extreme tought winter conditions that often results in in dangerous rescues, our men always come to the rescue. This is man vs nature and no rescue is too small for our rescue workers.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: After a period of warm temperatures and few rescues, tow truck boss Thord heaves a sigh of relief when it starts snowing. In the snowstorm, a 20-ton transporter slides off the road, and a car falls into a deep ditch. Thord decides to rescue them both. He needs all the work he can get to keep his business going. On Bjorns territory, a foreign driver is stuck on a mountain pass. He has failed to put tyre chains on, which makes Bjorn grumpy.

programme.title: Engineering Connections
programme.desc: Richard Hammond journeys to discover the startling Engineering Connections behind the Troll A gas platform; the largest object ever moved by man across the surface of the Earth. During his voyage he reveals that Troll A owes its incredible design to a 19th Century French gardener, a 17th Century German mayor, a midwestern American architect and the dawn of the motor industry. Hidden in its DNA he finds a crystal glass, a farm building, a racing car, a plant pot and nothing!

programme.title: Engineering Connections
programme.desc: Richard Hammond reveals the startling engineering connections behind Hong Kong International Airport, one of the busiest and biggest in the world, sited on a specially constructed island. Then the worlds largest construction project it drew inspiration from a 13th Century Arab irrigation machine to create new land, and a WWII bomber and car suspension to make the terminal building light, airy and typhoon-proof. To reduce lost baggage designers turned to a bizarre Cold War spy device and a brass band was the proof of a crucial scientific principle which protects pilots from wind shear, all resulting in the new gateway to Asia.

programme.title: Engineering Connections
programme.desc: Richard Hammond reveals the engineering inspirations behind the tallest road bridge in the world - the Millau Viaduct, in France. He fires three quarters of a million volts from his finger tips to see how the power of lightning cut the steel structure quickly and accurately. The huge piers - 340 metres high, and which would look down on the Eiffel Tower - were positioned to millimetre accuracy with the system that located lost nuclear submarines. The longest road-deck in the world was launched along the top of the piers - and required the slipperiest substance known to man - Teflon; not even a gecko can stick to it. Steel cables hold the bridge in shape - born of a series of mining accidents. And to allow the bridge to expand a metre and a half in the summer sun the engineers turned to an ancient Celtic boat-building technique which can make concrete as bendy as wood.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: At the end of the last Ice Age, the first humans migrated into the Americas. Some believe they travelled overland, but now archaeologists are looking to the coast. And what does a 13,000-year-old skeleton found in the Mexican jungle tell us about these people and their world? By draining ta deep, underground cave, we reveal the new science rewriting the epic story of the first humans to live in the New World

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Once known as Queen of the Adriatic, Venice conquered the eastern Mediterranean, but how did her fleet enable her to become a maritime empire? The wreck of a 14th-century war galley uncovers Venices naval secrets; the wrecks of merchant ships reveal how Venice became an economic powerhouse; and how mass graves uncovered on a Venetian island show Venice faced an enemy which even she couldnt conquer.

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Hazen Audel joins the Evenki in the forests of Inner Mongolia where he learns to ride their highly prized Reindeer and protect them from bears and Lynx through the dark nights. When 2 of the herd go missing, Hazen sets off downstream in his hand made birch bark canoe then crosses deep, mosquito-infested bogs to retrieve them and return them to the herd - all the while, living off the land using traditional Evenki skills to survive.

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Hazen travels to the Malay Peninsula in search of the Mani tribe. These ancient hunter gatherers use traditional blowguns armed with poison tipped darts. Hazen is keen to join a hunt but first he must prove hes up to the challenge by surviving alone in this daunting wilderness. Home to vertical rock cliffs, wild jungle elephents and even tigers, its a dangerous envoironment where every step could be your last.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: In "Ice Road Rescue" we follow a group of heroic and tough men who challenges the rought winter conditions in Norway by rescuing heavy trailers passing through the norwegian mountain terrain. We follow our main charachters, the heroic rescue workers, in both the southern and norhern mountains of norway. With extreme tought winter conditions that often results in in dangerous rescues, our men always come to the rescue. This is man vs nature and no rescue is too small for our rescue workers.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: After a period of warm temperatures and few rescues, tow truck boss Thord heaves a sigh of relief when it starts snowing. In the snowstorm, a 20-ton transporter slides off the road, and a car falls into a deep ditch. Thord decides to rescue them both. He needs all the work he can get to keep his business going. On Bjorns territory, a foreign driver is stuck on a mountain pass. He has failed to put tyre chains on, which makes Bjorn grumpy.

programme.title: Ice Rroad Rescue
programme.desc: A tanker truck full of waste slides back on a narrow, icy hill, almost slamming into a snow-covered car. Its a tight spot, forcing Thord to use his lightweight pick-up - but one slip risks turning this rescue into a disaster. In Overhalla, tow-trucker Marius stops by Jo Rogers garage on a road trip south. But when the visit gets interrupted by an emergency call, Jo Roger invites Marius to join the rescue. What was a ten-minute coffee break turns into a hard nights work.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: The volatile climate of Southeast Alaska challenges Port Protections residents who live on the edge of society. Gary battles father time while securing needed resources. Curly pushes through in the wake of a tragic loss. Mary faces her fears to survive in extreme conditions. Sam fights to preserve the only lifestyle hes ever known. Squibb looks to improve upon his surroundings. And Stuart deals with past injuries as he battles the elements.

programme.title: Lawless Island

programme.title: Ice Rroad Rescue
programme.desc: When a landslip takes out an excavator on a remote forest track, Thord and Bjoern join forces. But when the unstable ground threatens the rescue, the mission turns into a twelve-day challenge. In Odda, after another landslide, Domenic fears falling into the water trying to rescue a car thats been swept into the fjord. One thousand kilometres north, in Overhalla, Torsteins in double trouble when a truck and a car crash at the same spot. Final

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Hazen travels to Papua New Guinea to meet the Mirr tribe. These hunter gatherers are famed for their rich culture and are fiercely protective of their land and people. Hazen is keen to attend a tribal wedding, but first has to prove himself worthy by heading out into the wilderness alone. Hes tasked with bringing back three items for the groom - all essential for the tribal nuptials. But the hostile terrain proves challenging and time is against him.

programme.title: Primal Survivor
programme.desc: Hazen Audel, survival instructor and wilderness guide, travels to the most extreme places on earth to take on solo challenges that will push him to the limit of his knowledge, endurance and skills. Battling dense Guyana jungle, parched Kenyan plains and an active volcano in the Pacific Vanuatu islands. To succeed, he will rely on the ancient techniques of indigenous people who have lived in these environments for thousands of years.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: First Alaskans
programme.desc: When the Russians arrived by the 18th century, Alaskan Native peoples had been there for thousands of years, developing and perfecting sophisticated ways to thrive in the harshest of environments. Their traditions and methods have been passed down from generation to generation, and against all odds, theyve been able to keep their customs and unique way of life intact. Yet, it remains constant danger of extinction. In the face of Alaskas changing and brutal landscape, an ever-dwindling number of Alaskan Native peoples have but one recourse: to live as their ancestors did…and to teach subsequent generations everything about living with and from the landscape. In LIFE BELOW ZERO: FIRST ALASKANS, this brand-new returnable observational documentary series follows a select few of the original inhabitants who are relying on ancient wisdom, as well as hunting, building and survival techniques, to ensure their survival for the next thousand years. This is a celebration of culture, tradition and incredible strength by an inspirational group of people who always manage to find a way to live another day.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: First Alaskans
programme.desc: Working with their families, Indigenous Peoples of Alaska thrive and survive in the lands of their ancestors. Tig Strassburg trains his daughters to hunt for moose. Jody Potts-Joseph returns home to her native village of Eagle. Along with his sister, niece, and great-niece, Marvin Agnot fishes for halibut. And Daniel Apassingok works with his daughter as she pursues her first seal.

programme.title: Arctic Ascent with Alex Honnold
programme.desc: World-class rock climber Alex Honnold launches a first-ever Greenlandic expedition to climb a 4,000-foot sea cliff. First his team must cross a massive glacier and collect precious scientific data from this remote part of the world. Enroute to the upper reaches of the glacier, the team begins a 1,500-foot ascent of a never-before climbed rock wall.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Ultimate Supercar
programme.desc: A must see for petrolheads and connoisseurs, this series takes the viewer behind the scenes at some of the most legendary automobile manufacturers on the planet to reveal how their supercars are designed, engineered and constructed. From the DBS Superleggera of the last truly independent marque, Aston Marton, to Ferraris best-selling Portofino and from rappers favourite, the Bentley Continental GT. to the over-the-top Lamborghini Aventador SVJ, we learn what makes these beautiful machines unique and how it is the small, individual engineering secrets that make all the difference and ensure their mythical status and economic success.

programme.title: Ultimate Supercar
programme.desc: A must see for petrolheads and connoisseurs, this series takes the viewer behind the scenes at some of the most legendary automobile manufacturers on the planet to reveal how their supercars are designed, engineered and constructed. From the DBS Superleggera of the last truly independent marque, Aston Marton, to Ferraris best-selling Portofino and from rappers favourite, the Bentley Continental GT. to the over-the-top Lamborghini Aventador SVJ, we learn what makes these beautiful machines unique and how it is the small, individual engineering secrets that make all the difference and ensure their mythical status and economic success.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On 19 July 1989, United Airlines Flight 232 was making its regularly scheduled flight from Denver to Chicago when the DC-10 aircraft suffered a catastrophic failure to the tail-engine. The crew onboard faced the impossible task of landing with a total loss of control. 112 passengers perished in the horrific crash but thanks to the incredible crew, 184 people survived the fifth-deadliest crash involving a DC-10. In this episode we hear from multiple survivors as well as the first-officer, Bill Records, who gives a rare first-hand account from the cockpit, of what could have been the crews final moments..

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Glass may be the most popular construction material in the modern age. But constructing with glass is challenging and dangerous. It spontaneously breaks and falls from skyscrapers and it even crushes warehouse workers. We investigate the scientific anomaly of nickel sulfide inclusion and its effect on glass The vast majority of demolitions rely on the excavator to bring the building down. In this story we witness the perfect way to do it and contrast it with multiple examples of demolition by excavator fails. Operator error, unstable ground, unpredictable fall angles - we show it all.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Explore the engineering wonders of Europes northernmost region, from Icelands epic lava-defying barriers to Finlands record-breaking vertical factory. This spectacular journey uncovers the Nordics boldest builds including the construction of the worlds largest wooden city and a Swedish ferry that doesnt just sail—it flies.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Embark on a thrilling journey through Spains greatest feats of engineering. From the awe-inspiring technology thats bringing Barcelonas iconic Sagrada Familia to completion, to the secrets of Sevilles record-breaking wooden sun shade. Marvel at a gravity-defying skyscraper that seems to hover in the sky, and step back in time as a 2,000-year-old Roman theatre is nursed back to life.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The mask of Tutankhamun is one of the most famous finds of ancient Egypt, but close inspection reveals a consistent set of strange marks around all the hieroglyphs spelling Tutankhamuns name. Could the name have been engraved over top of another? In North America during World War II, strange and insidious-looking devices made of wood, rope, sandbags and gunpowder were found scattered across the northwestern USA and Canada. Who made them, and what was their sinister purpose? And in East London, a decorative clay bottle from the Middle Ages is uncovered. Not so strange, until the plug was removed and the bottles contents revealed to include rusty nails, centuries-old human hair, fingernails … and urine. What is this sorcery?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Easter Islands tall stone moai have long captured the global imagination, and there are still mysteries surrounding them. Out of nearly 1,000, why is one particular moai, called Tukuturi, the only one kneeling and sporting a beard? In 1950s USA, sightings of UFOs were a national phenomenon. Alien or not, many Americans didnt realize that the US military was working their own flying saucer: the Avrocar. And just after Newtons discoveries about gravity, 18th-century German physician Franz Anton Mesmer also proposed an invisible force that he called ""animal magnetism." To harness it, he built a device from a giant wooden tub saying it could cure any illness. Patients seemed to corroborate the claim, but could it be true?

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: At Australias busiest airport which operates 24/7, a blackout halts operations and Resource Coordinator Andrew tries to restore power within an hour. Air Traffic Controller Melissa manages up to 700 daily plane movements. A flight must dump fuel and return to the airport after take-off due to a faulty engine warning.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: Baggage manager Brodie races against the clock to reunite a passenger with their lost luggage. An airport visitor faces an unexpected mishap. In the hangar, engineers tackle a complex engineering challenge. As a full moon rises, the night shift contends with problem passengers. Adding to the pressure, a construction crews staircase installation risks blocking the airports sole access road.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Three planes fatally out of balance force investigators to question every calculation. Its a flight risk thats entirely preventable, and yet repeated disasters reconfirm the need for critical backup systems. With nearly 90,000 pounds of denim on board, a cargo plane in Miami crashes moments after lifting off. A packed commuter flight slams into a North Carolina hangar, revealing a deadly industry oversight. And, the NTSB is called in when a jumbo jet loaded with armored military vehicles pancakes to the ground in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they dont happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt

programme.title: Chris Hemsworth: a Road Trip to Remember
programme.desc: In his most personal documentary yet, Chris turns the camera on his own family after his dads recent Alzheimers diagnosis. They embark on a road trip into their past, exploring the science of social connection and how it can support memory function. They revisit meaningful places and faces, capturing it all as a home movie, and reviving treasured recollections.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Chess-playing computers are nothing new today, but how did a robot beat the worlds best chess players back in 1770? Is this the worlds first artificial intelligence, or is there sleight of hand at play? Charles Lindbergh was arguably the worlds most famous man in the 1930s, as the first to fly non-stop across the Atlantic and then have his son tragically kidnapped. Lesser known is his invention of a singular glass pump of elegant design. What is it for? A 2,400-year-old mummy is brought from Egypt to Croatia by a collector. Only after it is donated to a museum does anyone realize that this mummy is wrapped in the rarest remnant of a lost language. The writing on the wrappings is pored over by experts to decipher it. What does it say?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The lost colony of Roanoke is a historic mystery that has not been solved for over 400 years. An intriguing artifact was discovered in 1937: the Dare Stone. Apparently written by John White, it explains in detail what happened to the vanished colony. But is it real? World War I was the first major conflict to feature warplanes and, therefore, also the first to feature anti-air defence. How did an object resembling a satellite dish on wheels help gunners shoot down enemy planes? In Egypt, excavations of the Great Sphinx of Giza in 1817 uncovered six carved hunks of stone. Put together, they appear to be fragments of a large, braided stone beard, in the style of false beards worn by ancient pharaohs. The Sphinx never wore a beard … or did it?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: In 1898, a stunning object shows up at the British Museum. Carved and polished from a single piece of quartz, it is shaped like an immaculate human skull. Is this a creation of Mesoamericans, as originally claimed? Why is it rumoured to possess supernatural power? A gruesome-looking chair from ancient China, housed at the Wellcome Collection in London, is covered in sword blades, spikes and ornate decorations. Clearly, this is no love seat. Is it some kind of torture device, or more than meets the eye? From a long-buried library in the lost Assyrian city of Nineveh comes a peculiar round tablet scribbled with cuneiform writing. Is it the work of astronomers, proof of an ancient apocalypse, or a 3,000-year-old instruction manual?

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On 19 July 1989, United Airlines Flight 232 was making its regularly scheduled flight from Denver to Chicago when the DC-10 aircraft suffered a catastrophic failure to the tail-engine. The crew onboard faced the impossible task of landing with a total loss of control. 112 passengers perished in the horrific crash but thanks to the incredible crew, 184 people survived the fifth-deadliest crash involving a DC-10. In this episode we hear from multiple survivors as well as the first-officer, Bill Records, who gives a rare first-hand account from the cockpit, of what could have been the crews final moments..

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did the Surfside condo block in Miami collapse on its sleeping residents? What caused the lethal fire in Kings Cross subway station when it was packed with commuters? Why did Russias Kursk nuclear submarine sink without warning?

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Explore the engineering wonders of Europes northernmost region, from Icelands epic lava-defying barriers to Finlands record-breaking vertical factory. This spectacular journey uncovers the Nordics boldest builds including the construction of the worlds largest wooden city and a Swedish ferry that doesnt just sail—it flies.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Embark on a thrilling journey through Spains greatest feats of engineering. From the awe-inspiring technology thats bringing Barcelonas iconic Sagrada Familia to completion, to the secrets of Sevilles record-breaking wooden sun shade. Marvel at a gravity-defying skyscraper that seems to hover in the sky, and step back in time as a 2,000-year-old Roman theatre is nursed back to life.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Three planes fatally out of balance force investigators to question every calculation. Its a flight risk thats entirely preventable, and yet repeated disasters reconfirm the need for critical backup systems. With nearly 90,000 pounds of denim on board, a cargo plane in Miami crashes moments after lifting off. A packed commuter flight slams into a North Carolina hangar, revealing a deadly industry oversight. And, the NTSB is called in when a jumbo jet loaded with armored military vehicles pancakes to the ground in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they dont happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Extraordinary Australia
programme.desc: From lush ancient rainforests to wet grassland and dry eucalyptus forest, Australias diverse habitats are home to an array of weird and wonderful creatures found nowhere else on the planet. From the bizarre anatomy of the platypus to the savage screams of Tasmanian devils, the creatures of Australia rely on extraordinary adaptations to survive in continents vast and diverse habitats.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Shapeshifters. Whether transforming their body shape and color to disappear or mimicking their deadliest enemy. Octopus use shapeshifting superpowers to survive.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Masterminds. Deeply curious, strategic, and super smart - the octopus is one of natures ultimate problem solvers.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Social Networkers. The octopus was thought to be natures ultimate loner - now its secret social life is revealed.

programme.title: Sky Safari: Australia
programme.desc: Take an aerial odyssey across Australia, a dramatic continent full of strange and unique creatures and places. Experience powerful natural forces as we soar over Australias iconic landmarks of Uluru, the Great Barrier Reef, and Lake Eyre. In each location we descend to reveal how topography, climate and geographic isolation continue to challenge and shape the creatures that live here, and how those creatures interact with each other.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Shapeshifters. Whether transforming their body shape and color to disappear or mimicking their deadliest enemy. Octopus use shapeshifting superpowers to survive.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Masterminds. Deeply curious, strategic, and super smart - the octopus is one of natures ultimate problem solvers.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin journeys down Australias rivers to find which riparian animal is most built to survive. His first encounter is with the duck-billed platypus, a peculiar and adorable monotreme, or egg-laying mammal. Phil then gets a grip on the ultra-slimy long-finned eel and learns of its extraordinary reproductive habits before finally catching a river-dwelling bull shark.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin wanders into Australias woodlands to find the species most adapted for survival. Phil first encounters the yellow-bellied glider, an intrepid marsupial with a built-in wingsuit. Next is one of Australias most abundant but deadly reptiles, the eastern brown snake. Last but certainly not least, Phil finds the iconic, cuddly and oh-so-sleepy koala.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: When fight or flight instincts kick in, animals will do anything to survive. From heroic acts of bravery to narrow escapes and near misses, expect the unexpected when creatures encounter the animal kingdoms strangest curve balls.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Polar Bears
programme.desc: As the Arctic changes faster than ever, a team of polar bear guides prepares for an epic journey; a first-ever attempt to follow the bears on the sea ice of Hudson Bay. In this high-stakes high-reward venture, they will document the secret world of bears, a mysterious and disappearing realm that is the bears key to survival. Life on the ice is a critical time for these bears. It also remains undocumented, deemed too dangerous for humans to follow, hinted at only through aerial reconnaissance and satellite collar research. The team, armed with traditional ecological knowledge and the latest 4K camera technology, will witness never- before-seen seal hunting strategies and document rapid adaptations to climate change, including whale predation and open-water hunting.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols need to break ground for a new outbuilding that will house incoming livestock and Charles has dreamt up an outrageous idea of what that structure can be - and it just may be just crazy enough to work. At the auction, the Pols are hoping to purchase sheep and cows, but the skyrocketing bids threaten their big plans.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: This show explores the unbridled natural beauty of Americas national parks and highlights some of the most awe-inspiring scenery on the planet. Travelling beyond the more conventional tourist hot-spots, the viewer is transported to the hidden wonders of Americas wild spaces. Episodes include joining a scientific exploration of the 277 mile long Grand Canyon, studying its geological history, exploring the microscopic colonies of vegetation and examining its unique creatures; journeying through the Everglades, a 1.5 million acre home to strange creatures, carnivorous plants, amphibious birds and fish that can breathe air; and navigating across the northwest archipelago of Hawaii following a team of diving scientists as they inspect the unique aquaeous flora and fauna.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: This show explores the unbridled natural beauty of Americas national parks and highlights some of the most awe-inspiring scenery on the planet. programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Few of Europes countries boast the wide and wondrous variety of animals found in Greece. Its mainland is dubbed the Serengeti of Europe, while the coast is home to Europes largest marine reserve. Greece is a land brimming with natural treasures. Hidden hunters feast on migrating birds, a scorpion searches for his soulmate, and young seal pups venture out into the unknown.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins
programme.desc: The emperors are the largest and strongest of all penguins, living in the coldest, most extreme place on Earth.

programme.title: Europes Wild Marvels
programme.desc: Europes mountains may offer incredible views, but they are rarely an easy place to live. Golden eagles must soar high over the Alps to find food, while stags in the Scottish Highlands battle it out for valuable grazing land. Kidnapping is rife among Gibraltars Barbary macaques, and - in Norways high plateaus - musk oxen cant escape the harsh merciless winter. Faced with rugged landscapes and extreme weather conditions, Europes high-altitude animals must either adapt… or die trying.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: The parched lands of the Iberian Peninsula give rise to snow-covered peaks, expanses of rare cork oak, and Europes only fog forest. Unique habitats, where species found nowhere else on earth fight for survival. Male Iberian Ibex face-off over females, a whiskered tern chick braves predator-infested waters, and settling the score for the Macaques of Gibraltar calls for kidnap.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Germany is Europes most populous nation. A land hewn by mighty rivers and cloaked in forest. In these wild spaces, nature is full of surprises. From the Bavarian mountains to the North Sea, over a third of the country is now protected. Huge Grey Seals battle to breed, Marmots and Squirrels flee aerial invaders, and elusive Lynx and Moose - once hunted out - re-assert their grip.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Few of Europes countries boast the wide and wondrous variety of animals found in Greece. Its mainland is dubbed the Serengeti of Europe, while the coast is home to Europes largest marine reserve. Greece is a land brimming with natural treasures. Hidden hunters feast on migrating birds, a scorpion searches for his soulmate, and young seal pups venture out into the unknown.

programme.title: Europes Wild Marvels
programme.desc: With leopards in its mountains, blue whales off its coasts, and foxes roaming its city centres, Europe is a continent full of wild surprises. From the frozen glaciers of Iceland to the lush islands of the Azores, and from the rugged peaks of the Caucasus to the metropolis of London, the first episode in this stunning series highlights Europes astonishing diversity, all shot with breath-taking brio and the latest technology to reveal the continent and its animals in all its breath-taking glory.

programme.title: Europes Wild Marvels
programme.desc: Europes mountains may offer incredible views, but they are rarely an easy place to live. Golden eagles must soar high over the Alps to find food, while stags in the Scottish Highlands battle it out for valuable grazing land. Kidnapping is rife among Gibraltars Barbary macaques, and - in Norways high plateaus - musk oxen cant escape the harsh merciless winter. Faced with rugged landscapes and extreme weather conditions, Europes high-altitude animals must either adapt… or die trying.

programme.title: Europes Wild Marvels
programme.desc: Europe is a continent of diversity, and its coasts are no exception. From the frozen Arctic Ocean, where polar bears and reindeer battle for survival, to the warm beaches of the Mediterranean, home to pink flamingos and killer corals, Europes coastline attracts a staggering array of wildlife. Its also the setting for some of the worlds most jaw-dropping natural spectacles, including orcas and humpback whales hunting side by side, and wild horses running free on the beaches of the Camargue.

programme.title: Wild Transylvania: Draculas Hidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Draculas Transylvania lair is brimming with amazing wildlife. Shielded by the Carpathian Mountains, its a pristine wonderland that remains unchanged since the Middle Ages. Home to 26 species of bats, his kingdom is truly a night flyers paradise. Chamois, cuckoos, Ural owls, wild boar, lynx, brown bears, and huge wolf packs also thrive in a natural world beyond Bram Stokers imagination.

programme.title: Europes New Wild
programme.desc: This stunning six-part nature series tells the inspiring story of the rebirthing of the wild regions of the continent of Europe. A land formerly full of diverse wildlife and contrasting landscapes, Europe was in need of special rewilding teams to embark on a mission to return species to their natural habitat and this series focuses on six regions that have benefitted from the project. The Carpathian Mountains of Romania have seen the reintroduction of European bison while rural depopulation in Spain and Portugal offers up the opportunity to expand the wild nature of the Iberian Peninsula. The teams also look at how bears and humans can live peacefully, side by side and explores the myriad creatures that call the Danube Delta home. The unique culture and atmosphere of Lapland plays host to distinctive wildlife and the Sámi people and a natural balance is being restored to the Balkans.

programme.title: Europes Wild Marvels
programme.desc: Europe is a continent of diversity, and its coasts are no exception. From the frozen Arctic Ocean, where polar bears and reindeer battle for survival, to the warm beaches of the Mediterranean, home to pink flamingos and killer corals, Europes coastline attracts a staggering array of wildlife. Its also the setting for some of the worlds most jaw-dropping natural spectacles, including orcas and humpback whales hunting side by side, and wild horses running free on the beaches of the Camargue.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

Its also the setting for some of the worlds most jaw-dropping natural spectacles, including orcas and humpback whales hunting side by side, and wild horses running free on the beaches of the Camargue.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Germany is Europes most populous nation. A land hewn by mighty rivers and cloaked in forest. In these wild spaces, nature is full of surprises. From the Bavarian mountains to the North Sea, over a third of the country is now protected. Huge Grey Seals battle to breed, Marmots and Squirrels flee aerial invaders, and elusive Lynx and Moose - once hunted out - re-assert their grip.

programme.title: Hidden Wonders of Europe
programme.desc: Few of Europes countries boast the wide and wondrous variety of animals found in Greece. Its mainland is dubbed the Serengeti of Europe, while the coast is home to Europes largest marine reserve. Greece is a land brimming with natural treasures. Hidden hunters feast on migrating birds, a scorpion searches for his soulmate, and young seal pups venture out into the unknown.

programme.title: Europes Wild Marvels
programme.desc: With leopards in its mountains, blue whales off its coasts, and foxes roaming its city centres, Europe is a continent full of wild surprises. From the frozen glaciers of Iceland to the lush islands of the Azores, and from the rugged peaks of the Caucasus to the metropolis of London, the first episode in this stunning series highlights Europes astonishing diversity, all shot with breath-taking brio and the latest technology to reveal the continent and its animals in all its breath-taking glory.

programme.title: Europes Wild Marvels
programme.desc: Europes mountains may offer incredible views, but they are rarely an easy place to live. Golden eagles must soar high over the Alps to find food, while stags in the Scottish Highlands battle it out for valuable grazing land. Kidnapping is rife among Gibraltars Barbary macaques, and - in Norways high plateaus - musk oxen cant escape the harsh merciless winter. Faced with rugged landscapes and extreme weather conditions, Europes high-altitude animals must either adapt… or die trying.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins
programme.desc: The emperors are the largest and strongest of all penguins, living in the coldest, most extreme place on Earth.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīci ir pārņēmis noslēpums. Kad pēkšņi pazūd pilsētnieku skulptūra, Rabla komandai pievienojas Čeiss, lai atrisinātu pazudušās statujas noslēpumu... un uzbūvētu gluži jaunu Zinātnes centru, lai palīdzētu izmeklēt.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora ceļo pa lietusmežu, sacerot dziesmiņu tētim, lai kopā ar viņu nosvinētu Tēta un Doras dienu! Dora ir gatava Čurro fiestai, taču izrādās, ka visus našķus ir apēduši Pirātrukši. Dora dodas meklēt īpašu dārgumu lādi, kurā paslēpti zelta čurro.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Ir Padingtona dzimšanas diena, un Brauni viņam uzdāvina ne tikai gardu kūku, bet arī jauku piedzīvojumu – ekskursiju pa Londonu. Taču piedzīvojums izvēršas pavisam neparasts, kad Padingtons apmaldās un attopas pie kādiem īpašiem vārtiem, caur kuriem nokļūst Londonas Tauerā un vairāku netīšu un nelāgu kļūmju dēļ sarīko jandāliņu ar kroņa dārglietām.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons gatavo lipekli, bet vai viņš spēs turēt doto vārdu neradīt jucekli, kad lietas vairs nav kontrolējamas? Padingtons un Simi dodas brīnumainā ceļojumā pa cilvēka ķermeni, lai redzētu, vai apēsta ābola sēkliņa vēderā var izaugt par koku.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Komanda ar Ķepu Patruļas Maršalu būvē pirmo ugunsdzēsības departamentu. Kad Maršala ugunsdzēsības mašīna tiek sabotēta, visi strādā kopā, lai nodzēstu uguni

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni ir sajūsmā, kad viņu mīļākā TV zvaigzne Henks Hammers grib redzēt, kā viņi strādā. Kapteinis Turbo ir sagādājis pārsteigumu. Kad saceļas migla, komandai ir jāuzceļ bāka.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons sarīko Mateo dzimšanas dienas svinības, bet viss nenotiek kā iecerēts. Vai Braunas kundzes klauns izglābs situāciju? Padingtons nejauši spēles laikā atdod Džonatana reto Robotiņa kartīti. Kā viņš to atgūs?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Bērdas kundzes diena, un Padingtons grib izmantot tortē marmelādi no īpašās burkas, taču neviens to nespēj atvērt. Kā viņš izrādīs pateicību? Padingtons un Mateo nodibina galda tenisa komandu un pārspēj huligānus, lai spēlēt varētu visi.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Vindzoras parkā notiks ikgadējais jautrais skrējiens, bet Padingtons nav formā, tāpēc Bērdas kundze izlemj trenēt viņu. Džonatans, Džūdija un Padingtons nejauši salauž Bērdas kundzes šūpuļkrēslu. Kā viņi to salabos, lai viņa neuzzinātu?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kurš grib nozagt Karija kunga augstu vērtēto milzu ķirbi? Izmeklē policists Velss un Padingtons. Parkā ir slidotava, un Grūbera kungs māca Padingtonam slidot pirms ledus diskotēkas. Vai pašam pietiks drosmes kāpt uz ledus pēc kritiena?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Vērojot zvaignzes Barbatētis un Lolita pamana lidojošo šķivīti un steidz pamodināt visu ģimeni. Izrādās, ka ciemos atlidojuši draugi, kuriem līdzi ir lielkājains mazulis, kurš pēkšņi uzradās viņu planētā. Ģimene ar kosmosa kuģi dodas mazuļa planētas meklējumos. // Barbatētis cer, ka viņi drīz atradīs mazuļa planētu. Bet ne viss iet pēc plāna un viņi nolaižas uz ļoti dīvainas planētas. Kā viņi tiks prom un vai atradīs mazuļa planētu?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi - katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu - sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts - Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad komanda uzbūvē īpašu limonādes stendu Lūkasam un Lilija, īgnais Ātrmeistars ieripina to Celtnieklīča ielās. Kāpēc bebrs Krančijs šķērso ceļu? Jo Rabla komanda būvē tiltu, lai palīdzētu viņam nokļūt ceļa otrā pusē.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Benijam un vienraga dinozauram Uni atgūt pazaudēto burvju otu, lai Uni varētu atgriezties pie sava mīļdzīvnieka Zaķradža. Dora palīdz rumpulītei Hārtijai, lai viņa beidzot varētu piedalīties Rumpuļu spēlēs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Katram bērnam ir jādemonstrē savs talants.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gabriels rīko Talantu šovu, taču Ātrummeistars izdomā plānu, lai viņš būtu vienīgais dalībnieks. Cetnieklīča svētkos dziedās Sjerra Spīdošā, un vajadzīgi jauni instrumenti.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Fermeri Zoju piemeklē likstas - ražu apēd neatlaidīga vāvere.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti. Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.
